thread.section_title: Laptopscreen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laptopscreen | www.laptopscreen.com
thread.title: Richard Rose

author: Richard Rose
title: Richard Rose
text: I needed a replacement screen for a HP Envy 15. A little research via model number and a replacement was found. I ordered it and with 2 day shipping, had it in hand for only $58. I studied a few similar videos for this screen and changed it out in less than 15 minutes. It works fine with no issues. Best Buy wanted $300 and the laptop for 3 weeks to fix. Do it yourself and save the cash. Very happy with this experience.
